verbs.description: Punches [V: were] thrown as protesters and Trump supporters clashed before a planned rally in Chicago , and rivals were quick to blame Trump 's rhetoric .

Punches were thrown as protesters and Trump supporters clashed before a planned rally in Chicago , and [ARG1: rivals] [V: were] [ARG2: quick to blame Trump 's rhetoric] .
Punches were thrown as protesters and Trump supporters clashed before a planned rally in Chicago , and [ARG0: rivals] were quick to [V: blame] [ARG1: Trump 's rhetoric] .
